programme.title: Indian Premier League
programme.desc: Kolkata Knight Riders begin the 2015 Indian Premier League season with a clash against Mumbai Indians at Eden Gardens in Kolkata. The defending champions beat Mumbai twice last season..(n)

programme.title: Big Bash Cricket
programme.desc: Sydney Thunder host the Sydney Sixers at ANZ Stadium in the Big Bash League. The Sixers have won their opening two games..(n)

programme.title: Indian Premier League
programme.desc: Kings XI Punjab face Rajasthan Royals at the MCA Stadium in the Indian Premier League. The Kings XI are looking to banish the memories of last year's final defeat to Kolkata Knight Riders..(n)

programme.title: Super League
programme.desc: Hull face Widnes Vikings at the KC Stadium in round ten of Super League. The Vikings will be out for revenge having suffered a humiliating 56-6 loss to Hull last season..(n)

programme.desc: A chance to relive the 1999 Super League Grand Final between St Helens and Bradford Bulls. Bradford earned a dominant victory over the Saints in the qualifying semi-final..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Sean Fitzpatrick
programme.desc: A look at the career of Sean Fitzpatrick, one of the finest rugby union players New Zealand has ever produced. A World Cup winner in 1987, Fitzpatrick earned 92 caps for his country..(n)

programme.title: Super Rugby
programme.desc: Crusaders take on Highlanders at AMI Park in round nine of Super Rugby. The side from Canterbury won this season's reverse fixture 26-20..(n)

programme.title: Super Rugby
programme.desc: Waratahs face Stormers at Allianz Stadium in round nine of Super Rugby. Last year's champions secured a 22-11 victory against the side from Cape Town in last season's competition..(n)

programme.title: Inverness v Celtic
programme.desc: Inverness face Celtic at Caledonian Stadium in the Scottish Premiership. The side from the Highlands claimed a surprise 1-0 victory against the Hoops earlier this season..(n)

programme.title: WWE Smackdown
programme.desc: Michael Cole, Jerry 'The King' Lawler and Byron Saxton present Smackdown, featuring stars like Randy Orton, Daniel Bryan and Dolph Ziggler. This programme contains flashing images..(n)

programme.title: Super League
programme.desc: Castleford Tigers take on Hull KR at The Mend-A-Hose Jungle in round ten of Super League. The Tigers earned an emphatic 54-12 win in last season's encounter..(n)

programme.title: Saturday Fight Night
programme.desc: Josh Warrington faces Dennis Tubieron for the vacant WBC International Featherweight title at the First Direct Arena in Leeds. Warrington can take his undefeated record to 21-0 with a win..(n)

programme.title: Indian Premier League
programme.desc: Chennai Super Kings face Sunrisers Hyderabad at MA Chidambaram Stadium in the Indian Premier League. Australian batsman David Warner fired Hyderabad to victory when the sides last met..(n)

programme.title: Indian Premier League
programme.desc: Kolkata Knight Riders take on Royal Challengers Bangalore at Eden Gardens in the Indian Premier League. Kolkata are aiming to register their fourth successive victory over Bangalore..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Lester Piggott
programme.desc: A look at the incredible career of Lester Piggott, one of the most successful jockeys in history..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Carl Lewis
programme.desc: A chance to relive the career of Carl Lewis. The American won nine Olympic gold medals in a variety of track and field events and still holds the world record for the indoor long jump..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Sergey Bubka
programme.desc: A look back on the career of famed Ukrainian pole-vaulter Sergey Bubka. He won consecutive gold medals in six World Championships and also topped the podium at the 1988 Olympic Games..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Greats: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: A tribute to boxing legend Muhammad Ali. The American, famed for his pre-fight antics, won 56 of his 61 professional bouts. He was a three-time world champion..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Heroes: Stirling Moss
programme.desc: Gary Newbon sits down with racing legend Stirling Moss. The British speedster is widely considered to be the greatest Formula 1 driver never to win a world championship..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Heroes: Naseem Hamed
programme.desc: Gary Newbon interviews 'Prince' Naseem Hamed about his prolific in-ring career. A former WBO, WBC and IBF featherweight champion, Hamed won 36 of his 37 professional fights..(n)

programme.title: Sporting Heroes: Frank Bruno
programme.desc: Former rugby league player and coach Ellery Hanley interviews former world heavyweight champion Frank Bruno. The prolific British boxer secured 38 of his 40 professional wins by knockout..(n)
